website_summaries.verdict: Offering all the features of more expensive models plus a convenient carry case, this affordable growler is a solid choice for budget-conscious buyers who don't want to sacrifice quality.
pros: Made of premium food-grade stainless steel
Double-walled vacuum insulation delivers excellent temperature control: 36 hours for cold beverages and 12 hours for hot liquids
Comes with a complimentary neoprene carrier for on-the-go convenience
cons: Smooth lid can be a bit fiddly to close correctly
Can pop open if picked up at the lid

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sure
customer_reviews.text: Great product for sure, but be careful holding it from the top. The lid isn't a traditional screw on cap. You can tighten it to "snug", but it's not tight enough to lift or carry holding on to the lid alone. I'm still learning that, and as a result I've dropped and spilled more of my Mojito's than I'd like to admit. Other than that, its a PHENOMINAL product. Does very, very well at keeping things cold.
customer_reviews.author: BrentS2017

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for extra water! I use a 24 oz bottle for "carry" but always like to have spare water in the car, at the beach, where ever. The shoulder strap makes this easier to carry - and the built-in handle on the insulated sleeve makes it possible for me to pour much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great growler for traveling. Our toddler son has a dairy protein sensitivity and drinks a special kind of milk not found in many places just yet. We travel a lot so this fits the entire 1/2 gallon and gives us about 5 days worth of cold milk. That’s usually enough time to find another store which carries it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your ice water precisely that.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like warm water. I like COLD water, especially in the warmer months. This growler from Grocery Art is perfect. I use a tray of ice and fill it with cold water that I kept in the fridge overnight... I have ice cold water for the whole day at work. Perfection. Hint: leave the cover on for maximum cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Bunz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Got thIs for my son to use as a water bottle for band practice and told her m if he takes care of it he can take it with him to college to use for beer, bottle of s easy to clean and well made and it should last for years
customer_reviews.author: C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad on Father’s Day- he loves it! He likes the carrying strap and the insulation of it and the big opening to drink out of!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Disanto

customer_reviews.title: Great attention to detail and refinement
customer_reviews.text: Great attention to detail and refinement. But best of all, it kept my lemonade cold at the beach for two days (ice was still in the Growler). I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: RTW & NLD

customer_reviews.title: The water stayed cool the entire 8 hours and the lip made it ...
customer_reviews.text: I carried my growler on my kayak trip. I kept it in the back of my kayak. The water stayed cool the entire 8 hours and the lip made it easy to drink out of. I liked the carrying case with the long strap. I could reach back and securely swing it around to the front. Great price for the same functionality as way more expensive items.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D. Tady

customer_reviews.title: Brand name quality without the brand name hype and price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for half the price of the big brand names. Comes with a handy cover and strap. I use this daily at work for this NorCal summer heat we get (+100°). Keeps my ice water cold all day. I may even order another one or two.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: CAP FALLS OFF NONSTOP AFTER 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: CAP ALWAYS FALLS OFF! We have had this for about 3 months, and the top literally falls off non stop. Trying to contact amazon for special request return, so please beware prior to purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Nikki L

customer_reviews.title: There's TWO Gaskets In The Lid
customer_reviews.text: It's a great growler, but I gave it 4 stars because of not informing the purchaser that there is an extra gasket in the lid that has to be removed so the lid will seal. Fortunately I have several friends with the same growler and they told me about the gasket. So now I'm telling you. If the extra gasket is not in the growler it is in the lid and must be removed to get the lid to seal. I'm thinking that all the negative reviews could be from this issue.
customer_reviews.author: ss4sale

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking product with or without sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Has just the right height to fit in my motor cycle's saddle bag. It kept the water cold and was easy to fill with ice cubes since it has a wide enough mouth. One of the features on the packaging box says that it has a "Vacuum seal." Don't know what that means, since the lid is a screw top lid. Have no idea how the air inside it can be evacuated to create a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: maiji

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The top is defective. It doesn’t stay on if the item falls or tips over. Forget ever grabbing or lifting it by the top. I bought it for water and no one can ever get it to thread on properly. It’s a frustrating wet mess.
customer_reviews.author: murr

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of keeping my drinks cold. However, the lead doesn't fit well and has come off several times causing major spills. I bought it because I want to do a better job of trinking more water throughout the day. It serves its purpose and that regard
customer_reviews.author: Myra L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lid is plastic, description and pictures are very good at purposefully hiding this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a plastic free growler, and this isn't it. The pictures are all taken at such an angle you can't see the plastic underside of the lid, just the thin stainless cover on top of the plastic lid. Otherwise this is a very nice growler with a good case on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ping2k

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I recommend. I go geocaching out in the sun for long periods of time in Arizona and all other water bottles are too small. Also, we know that plastic bottles leach toxic chemicals. Plastic water bottles are not refrigerated in transport, so they are heated in the delivery trucks, causing plastic chemicals to leach into the water. This bottle is stainless steel so no plasticy taste. Ice stays frozen, even overnight with the cover off.
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Poor lid design.
customer_reviews.text: The cover and aesthetics were nice but the lid leaves something to be desired. If you purchase this item treat the lid with kit gloves as any movement can cause it to open thus spilling your contents. Take your time threading it closed, check the gasket, & set it down somewhere as any bump or jar will cause the top to come off. Sincerely, look at another brand.
customer_reviews.author: REINALDO MARABOTTO

customer_reviews.title: Bad cap design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item strictly for use in my car. The first day I put this bottle to use it falls off the center console, lands behind my seat, the cap pops off, and I end up having to vaccuum 2l of water out of my car's carpet. Before I purchased this growler I was using a repurposed plastic orange juice bottle, and the cap never popped off during the countless times it's fell off the center console, rolled around, or slammed against a wall during a turn. I'd suggest looking into the Klean Kanteen if a reliable cap design is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Semerdjian

customer_reviews.title: Lid pops off when dropped
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the product at first as it was one of the shorter 64oz containers however I have accidentally dropped it a couple times and the lid has popped off both times spilling the water everywhere. Even after ensuring it was sealed it was not entirely leak proof and after dropping off of a table the lid popped off. The carrying case is a nice feature with a long and short strap for carrying. Overall disappointed due to the leak and lid that pops off.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan DeLaCruz

customer_reviews.title: Hard to seal cap
customer_reviews.text: The threads on the cap are very coarse and hard to align. So, on several occasions even with this knowledge I've cross threaded the cap on and the unit leaks all the fluid out. It's a big disappointment when I arrive at work and the passenger seat is soaked. Other than that it keeps water cold for three days!
customer_reviews.author: AV reader

customer_reviews.title: Also would be nice if there was some knurling or raised ridges on ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps drinks cold and ice takes a long time to melt. I found the lanyard to be an annoyance and removed it because the end on the bottle would get under the cap when trying to close it. Also would be nice if there was some knurling or raised ridges on the cap for a better grip. Otherwise, a flawless product and well worth the money in any case. So much better than plastic water jugs.
customer_reviews.author: millard fillmore

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I like that it holds a lot of water and comes with a neoprene carrier. (It can get a bit heavy with that much water.) The neoprene carrier is easy to remove because of a zippered bottom! Then I filled it halfway with ice, and the ice melted by the end of the day, but water stayed cold at 90 degrees. I like that the lid never gets misaligned like some other brands. But I found out the hard way that you need to screw it on tightly, or it will leak when laying on its side. Ala in all, I am very satisfied with my purchase. The price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ice and a cold drink for a good amount of time
customer_reviews.text: I like this bottle a lot. It keeps ice for at least 24 hours. One word of caution is you do need to make sure the lid is screwed on correctly and as tight as possible. Sometimes the rope from the lid gets caught underneath or the coozy can get caught as well. Learned that the hard way... but at least it only leaked water. I also broke one of the plastic clips to hold on the strap but that was most likely my fault...easily fixed with a paracord strap and new metal clips.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great! I teach and it’s hard to stay hydrated on the job when you don’t really ever have a break. This has been great for that, I just keep my ice cold water in here and pour out when I need. I’ve left it in my car overnight in the summer and the ice is still there the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: There are not replaceable "Sip-able" Lids that fit this 64oz Growler.
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed that there's not sip-able lid that can be found for this 64oz Growler, (I use mine to keep my water ice cold, not Beer). I ordered two different lids from Amazon that did not fit, even though they were advertised to fit this 62oz Growler. I returned them. I even searched via to brick and mortar stores, Dicks Sporting Goods and REI, and they didn't have a sip-able Lid either. I am highly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Coleman-Peck

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the lid does not have a good seal and leaked
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the lid does not have a good seal and leaked. Thought it was my fault but after losing 2 rounds of beer it is definitely the lid that comes off. The threads on the screw top are not long enough to be effective. Nice design and effort but has cost more money than it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: E Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Only used the bottle for water and it definitely keeps it cold for a long time. I started with filling the bottle 1/2 way with ice in the evening. The next morning I filled the container with water and I still had ice in it the following day. Works great! The outside coloring (blue) does chip off easily as it got scratched up the first day using it. And a slight drop cause the lid to dent. But I am taking it to work and using it everyday so it's expected to get some dings.
customer_reviews.author: Bmore22

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband to bring to work so he would drink more water throughout the day. He loves it because if he takes water it stays cold all day and if he takes something warmer like chili it stays hot until lunch! Another bonus about this was the case, it has a handle and a strap so its easy to carry with you all day. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid sucks
customer_reviews.text: The lid sucks. Won't stay on. Which means it's useless for anything active.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: All Day Cold Water
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! Keeps my water cold while I am working out in my gym that has no air conditioning!! UPDATE: fell over in my car and leaked all over my backseat even with the lid on tight. The mouth is huge. It spills everytime I drink from it.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee G

customer_reviews.title: Best water jug I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it price was right has held ice for 2 days which is way better than my old water jug of about 4 hrs so I’m super pleased the carry bag is awesome too I have told everyone I work with so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Lid needs Gripping surface
customer_reviews.text: Lid is too smooth very hard to unscrew and as hard to align it to screw on correctly...spent a great amount of time trying to open the dog gone thing.
customer_reviews.author: Davi

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: Smells like bleach after a few days. Why? It does what it says it will do. But the stench is more than u can take. Even after cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Decent bottle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the item on April 27, 2018, and the bottle I received has a lid that doesn't close securely. If you tighten, it skips the threading and loosens. It's now apparently too late to return the item and impossible to contact the seller. Do not buy. Edit: after reading more reviews, I saw people mentioning needing to remove a spare gasket in the lid to tighten in, and surely enough, that fixed the issue for me. Minus a star for not including any instructions to remove the extra gasket before use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: Great seller - First rate customer service
customer_reviews.text: I carry this growler with me everywhere to make sure I’m drinking enough water. It is convenient, keeps my water cold, and I will buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Q. Morant

customer_reviews.title: Cool item to get
customer_reviews.text: Its actually a really well constructed item. I tested it with the sleeve on and it does actually keep drinks cold with ice for upto 36 hours..must fill half way with ice though.
customer_reviews.author: this guy

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it for work because his water still really cool all day
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Only keeps water cool for 12 hours max
customer_reviews.text: Well built product, I use it to keep water cool in hot south Florida climate. But water only stays cool for about 12 hours not 36 as advertised. After that water is tepid. I Did not use it for hot things. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: large mouth
customer_reviews.text: this product is great easy to clean with the large opening
customer_reviews.author: Mikel

customer_reviews.title: This is really really insulated
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a serious tank!! The cold really stays cold and the hot stays hot... FOREVER! I will be getting another one of these....
customer_reviews.author: T C

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to clean and keep it all really cold
customer_reviews.author: james jisa

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t close correctly
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of this holder especially when I have to walk around the park with the kids. The holder is great. The only issue is the actual lid doesn’t close. I want to say it closes correctly roughly 20 percent of the time. Most of the time I go to grab it and it opens or leaks. I wish there was a better alternative to their lid because it really is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Try to get a drinking lid to go with it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product but I do wish it came with a drinking lid. I use it everyday and I have been ordering drinking lids for it and can't find one that will fit its size. Any suggestions
customer_reviews.author: Diane Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Lid is difficult.
customer_reviews.text: The lid is difficult to open and close, and its an unusual sized lid. I also have the Swig Savvy of this size and it is much easier to use than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it for hot water
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty well made. I love keeping hot water near me for tea at work and this keeps the water hot for a good 10-12 hours. If anything changes, I will update it here later.
customer_reviews.author: Felix C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Fathers Day. He loved it !!! The carry bag & the lid holder line are a giant plus!!! I plan on buying more of these for gifts !
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and carrier jacket with strap tops it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only use a couple of times but my drinks stayed icy cold. The quality is impressive. Easy to clean and carrier jacket with strap tops it off. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy T.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great quality growlers on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Lots of great quality growlers on Amazon, but for some reason this one popped out. I love the neoprene carry bag! The lid is steel, not plastic, and has a lanyard to keep from being lost. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Durable and insulated
customer_reviews.text: Quite a high quality growler - I use it for my sport drink to remind me to consume 2 liters a day ... durable, great construction and the insulated cover is genius!
customer_reviews.author: Stan B Yunker

customer_reviews.title: all day refreshment
customer_reviews.text: how wonderful just to take a water bottle and know it will last you with cold refreshing water ALL day through!!
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: and so far so good. I love that now I can carry all ...
customer_reviews.text: I have just have it for a few days, and so far so good. I love that now I can carry all my water for the day and matain it cool at all time. The carring case is wat sell the bottle. A bottle that side will be difficult to carry without a good case. It is very sturdy and we'll built bottle. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eliette

customer_reviews.title: Lid not the same as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle because every picture showed an all metal lid. What I received is not what is pictured! Edit: after weeks of use the lid seems fine. Just not what was pictured so I only gave 4 stars..... Seller ensured me the "plastic" is an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Bad lid design
customer_reviews.text: Lid just pops off randomly started day one. Not a good design. Good bottle if you dont leave the house. Other then that it sucks
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Beechler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and finish, attractive packaging, delivered on time. Fitted jacket is a nice feature to improve grip, carrying, as well as to protect bottle from damage and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Edward K.

customer_reviews.title: Cap comes right off
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife who wants a big water bottle to carry everywhere. She loved it at first but it’s been about six weeks and we realized the cap comes off easily. We try to twist it on, but then it comes right off. If it’s full of water and tips off, the cap comes off. Would return it but it’s past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Alan T. Luu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Once he figured out the lid he loves it. It lasts all day at work
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Houzenga

customer_reviews.title: Pretty balanced for the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a 64oz growler bottle for mass amounts of water during work and I got what I wanted. Keeps ice cold for a solid 8hrs, which means cool water whenever I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Meredith Collins

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Keeps water ice cold for 24-28 hours. If you put 2/3 of the way up in ice it keeps it that way.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Best Water Bottle Yet!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many water bottles in my time! I love that this one has a handle, and a case to carry it around in. It makes it easy to carry around a half a gallon of water wherever I go! This is a must for anyone who needs to drink more water throughout the day!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to carry fresh beer, it works great. Large enough, and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Whites

customer_reviews.title: Great product all around!
customer_reviews.text: Keep my drinks cold all day, easy to carry and doesn't leak
customer_reviews.author: Julian McLeal

customer_reviews.title: I Love this water bottle because of its size as well ...
customer_reviews.text: I Love this water bottle because of its size as well as maintaining hot/cold temperature for extended of hours. In addition to that the capacity of the bottle accommodates daily recommended water intake. If anybody serious about his/her health should get the bottle and easily monitor their flood in take by having this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Impressive. Hope it holds up . . . looks like it will ?
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Poor threading on the lid
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this product except for the lid. The threading is not very good and so the lid constantly pops off. I can get it to seal after a few minutes of fussing but when you are opening and closing it a lot the poor threading creates a high chance for spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Carlson

customer_reviews.title: It's great other than you can't pick it up by the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great other than you can't pick it up by the lid .The lid will pop right off but it doesn't leak .
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Ice all day
customer_reviews.text: Keeps ice all day. Water is ice cold. Fill it the night before with ice and water. Keep it in fridge overnight refill in morning with ice and good all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Zeinert

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It keeps me accountable for making sure I drink enough water at work My water stays cold and I don’t have to refill it with ice constantly
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little cooler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little cooler. Water stays cold for as long as I need it for. My only gripe, and Im sure its probably me, top always wants to screw on crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Carrying pouch is definitely a plus. It's. For me, it's the only way to make sure I'm getting my water in. I also need it cold. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie in Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar growler and a co-worker was commenting on it. I purchased this one for him and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth P. Waldeck

customer_reviews.title: not satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Why this products says hold ice for a long period and my ice melts in like 4 hours time, my Contiga bottle hole full ice cubes for more than 2 days this what i was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Washington

customer_reviews.title: Good product for value
customer_reviews.text: Keeps cool my beverages. Built strong and durable. The neoprene cover is too soft though for a 64 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Cap won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great product to keep your liquids cold, but the lid is flawed. It will not stay on.
customer_reviews.author: monymac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, will enjoy using it on trips to beach and fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ed

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Really like this growler. Hold ice forever. Very well made, great quality for reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: My wife wanted a larger water bottle that would last ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a larger water bottle that would last her through several hours of being outside in the sun. Safe to say this has done it for it. She said she puts some ice in it in the morning, and the cubes will last her till the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: John U.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good wide mouth but not good wide mouth selection accessories. Hard to find with a straw cap!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I live in the desert and work outside. Even in the 115 degree heat my water stays cold for eight hours.
customer_reviews.author: bryon castor

customer_reviews.title: Keep those plastic bottle from the waste stream
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for cold water on long car trips. Nice quality and handy insulated carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Danville 209

customer_reviews.title: Loose lid
customer_reviews.text: The lid is loose and sometimes would pop up and open by itself
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fostanes

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water cold for hours
customer_reviews.text: Bottle is easy to carry with adjustable strap. The wide mouth is makes it easy to add ice and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Finally i found a mug that can hold enough water for the entire day! This one is great! Above average quality!
customer_reviews.author: Janice B.

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Best water bottle my husband has ever used. Keeps ice frozen and water cold for days! No complaints! Buy it. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: mlysne

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I really love that can do hot or cold my only draw back is that I should have interchangable sleeves
customer_reviews.author: P. Stewart-lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great Growler
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiancé! Keeps both hot and cold. He uses it for work ice has stayed for days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than drinking out of plastic "bpa" free. And your drink tastes clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love this 64oz flask I work outdoors and I use it for water it's the perfect amount and it stays ice cold. I usually drink the water before the ice melts it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Pascual A Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps ice for three days have not tried hot liquids yet. Love this bottle
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Big Ass Insulated Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle! I work in an office setting and don't have access to clean water so I fill this big ass bottle to keep me covered for the duration of my shift. Love the bottle carrier without it things would get awkard.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great cold water
customer_reviews.text: I like that is sturdy and has kept my water cold all day
customer_reviews.author: ania

customer_reviews.title: ... need to use it more to actually know how happy I am with the product but from couple time ...
customer_reviews.text: Still need to use it more to actually know how happy I am with the product but from couple time use I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shikshya

customer_reviews.title: Great size for water
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking water to work and maintaining a cool temp
customer_reviews.author: Tim Retallack

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Beer... keeps nice and cold. Loved it when I was hanging out in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cold
customer_reviews.text: The best ever im a truck driver in calif.It stays cold all day
customer_reviews.author: MICKEY

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I like how it keeps my water cold all day. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Milk jug
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a Coleman “water” jug for taking milk to work. This works so much better and keeps the mill much colder.

customer_reviews.title: Great "beverage" bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love that it comes with it's own insulated carrying case and that the lid is attached. This will come in handy for all sorts of "beverages".
